content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to use different paths with the execute_shell command to activate conda and run a Python script, but received error messages indicating that the necessary conda.sh file could not be found. The latest attempt involved using the path /home/katmai/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, but it still did not work. The latest development shows that when attempting to activate conda and run the Python script using the execute_shell command, an error message was returned indicating that the activate script could not be found.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/katmai/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/katmai/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/katmai/anaconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/katmai/anaconda3/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /opt/conda/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /opt/conda/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
